languages.text: {n}Не успеваете вы поднять руку, как Ирлиэт молниеносно выгибается и тут же оказывается в недосягаемости от вашей ладони.{/n} "Кей-морагх, мон-кай! Что ты себе позволяешь?"
{n}The moment you raise your hand, Yrliet twists out of your reach in a lightning-fast motion.{/n} "Kae-morag, mon-keigh! What do you think you are doing?"
languages.original_text: {n}Не успеваете вы поднять руку, как Ирлиэт молниеносно выгибается и тут же оказывается в недосягаемости от вашей ладони.{/n} "Кей-морагх, мон-кай! Что ты себе позволяешь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The moment you raise your hand, Yrliet twists out of your reach in a lightning-fast motion.{/n} "Kae-morag, mon-keigh! What do you think you are doing?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The moment you raise your hand, Yrliet twists out of your reach in a lightning-fast motion.{/n} "Kae-morag, mon-keigh! What do you think you are doing?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The moment you raise your hand, Yrliet twists out of your reach in a lightning-fast motion.{/n} "Kae-morag, mon-keigh! What do you think you are doing?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The moment you raise your hand, Yrliet twists out of your reach in a lightning-fast motion.{/n} "Kae-morag, mon-keigh! What do you think you are doing?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}En cuanto levantas la mano, Yrliet se aparta de tu alcance con la velocidad del rayo.{/n} «¡Kae-morag, mon-keigh! ¿Qué crees que estás haciendo?».
languages.original_text: {n}The moment you raise your hand, Yrliet twists out of your reach in a lightning-fast motion.{/n} "Kae-morag, mon-keigh! What do you think you are doing?"

traits.locale_text: {n}En cuanto levantas la mano, Yrliet se aparta de tu alcance con la velocidad del rayo.{/n} «¡Kae-morag, mon-keigh! ¿Qué crees que estás haciendo?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}手をあげた瞬間、ユリエットは光の速さでこちらの手が届かない範囲まで移動する。{/n}「カエ＝モラグ、モン＝ケイ！何をする？」
languages.original_text: {n}The moment you raise your hand, Yrliet twists out of your reach in a lightning-fast motion.{/n} "Kae-morag, mon-keigh! What do you think you are doing?"

traits.locale_text: {n}手をあげた瞬間、ユリエットは光の速さでこちらの手が届かない範囲まで移動する。{/n}「カエ＝モラグ、モン＝ケイ！何をする？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}你刚举起手，伊莉耶特便以闪电般的速度，闪身到了你碰不到的地方。{/n}“该死，猴子！你知道你在干什么吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The moment you raise your hand, Yrliet twists out of your reach in a lightning-fast motion.{/n} "Kae-morag, mon-keigh! What do you think you are doing?"

traits.locale_text: {n}你刚举起手，伊莉耶特便以闪电般的速度，闪身到了你碰不到的地方。{/n}“该死，猴子！你知道你在干什么吗？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}À peine avez-vous levé la main qu'Yrliet bondit en un éclair hors de votre portée.{/n} « Kae-morag, mon-keigh ! Je peux savoir ce que vous faites ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The moment you raise your hand, Yrliet twists out of your reach in a lightning-fast motion.{/n} "Kae-morag, mon-keigh! What do you think you are doing?"

traits.locale_text: {n}À peine avez-vous levé la main qu'Yrliet bondit en un éclair hors de votre portée.{/n} « Kae-morag, mon-keigh ! Je peux savoir ce que vous faites ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kaum hebst du deine Hand, wirbelt Yrliet blitzschnell aus deiner Reichweite.{/n} "Kae-morag, Chem-Pan-Sey! Was soll das werden?"
languages.original_text: {n}The moment you raise your hand, Yrliet twists out of your reach in a lightning-fast motion.{/n} "Kae-morag, mon-keigh! What do you think you are doing?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kaum hebst du deine Hand, wirbelt Yrliet blitzschnell aus deiner Reichweite.{/n} "Kae-morag, Chem-Pan-Sey! Was soll das werden?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The moment you raise your hand, Yrliet twists out of your reach in a lightning-fast motion.{/n} "Kae-morag, mon-keigh! What do you think you are doing?"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, elini kaldırdığın anda yıldırım hızıyla sıyrılarak uzaklaşıyor.{/n} "Kae-morag mon-keigh! Sen ne yaptığını sanıyorsun?"
languages.original_text: {n}The moment you raise your hand, Yrliet twists out of your reach in a lightning-fast motion.{/n} "Kae-morag, mon-keigh! What do you think you are doing?"

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
